General.Name: Kwong Lung Enterprise Co Ltd
General.Description: Kwong Lung Enterprise Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells apparel in Taiwan, China, Vietnam, and Japan. The company operates through Apparel department, Down Material Department, and Home Textile Department segments. It offers down and bedding; Outerwear knitting mills; clothing accessories; cleaning products; wholesale and retail sale of cloths, shoes, hat, umbrella, furniture, bedclothes, kitchen equipment, fixtures, articles for daily use, cleaning preparations, and other textile products; and wholesale of pottery, porcelain, and glassware, as well as related packaging materials. The company also involved in the international trade; and import and export of goods and technology. Kwong Lung Enterprise Co., Ltd. was incorporated in 1966 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 105, Dunhua S. Road, Taipei, Taiwan, 106
